title: Spanish Chicken
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - pounded thin', '8 tablespoons plain flour', '6 rashers streaky bacon, chopped', '2 onions, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '6 dates, stones removed and chopped', '475ml chicken stock', '1 dessertspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon garlic granules, or minced fresh garlic', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'dried thyme to taste']
